  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status

    public class Spaces
extends play.mvc.Controller
    functions for managing spaces (instances of plugins)

        public static Space add(org.bson.types.ObjectId userId,

        java.lang.String type,
        java.lang.String context)
                 throws AppException
        helper function to create a new space
        Parameters:
        userId - ID of user owning the space
        name - name of the space
        visualizationId - plugin to be used for space
        appId - input form to be used for space
        context - name of dashboard where space should be shown
        Returns:
        Throws:
        InternalServerException
